## Discussion: what's wrong with this chart?

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: true
ggplot2::theme_set(ggplot2::theme_grey(base_size = 40))
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: true
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
plot_data <- ToothGrowth %>%
  mutate(dose = factor(dose)) %>%
  group_by(dose, supp) %>%
  summarise(len = mean(len)) %>%
  ungroup()

# Unstyled plot
ggplot(
  data = plot_data,
  mapping = aes(x = len, y = dose, fill = supp)
) +
  geom_col(position = "dodge")
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: true

  minutes = 5,
  color_border = "#005573",

  color_finished_background = "#d3a435",
  top = 0,
  margin = "0.7em",
  font_size = "1.8em"
)
```

## Installation

Installing from GitHub:

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
remotes::install_github("nrennie/RSSthemes")
```

Load package:

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: true
library(RSSthemes)
```

## Example: plotting with base R

::: columns
::: {.column}

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| echo: true
barplot(
  height = table(mtcars$gear),
  col = factor(
    unique(mtcars$gear)
    )
)
```

:::

::: {.column .fragment}

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| echo: true
set_rss_palette("signif_qual")
barplot(
  height = table(mtcars$gear),
  col = factor(
    unique(mtcars$gear)
    )
)
```

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| echo: false
palette("default")
```

## {ggplot2}: basic plot

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| output-location: column
library(ggplot2)
g <- ggplot(data = mtcars) +
  geom_bar(
    mapping = aes(
      x = cyl,
      fill = factor(vs)
      )
    )
g
```

## {ggplot2}: scales

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| output-location: column
#| code-line-numbers: "2"
g +
  scale_fill_rss_d("signif_qual")
```

## {ggplot2}: theme

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| output-location: column
#| code-line-numbers: "3"
g +
  scale_fill_rss_d("signif_qual") +
  theme_significance()
```
